name: NSScrubberProportionalLayout
desc: A concrete layout object that sizes each item to some fraction of the scrubber's visible size.

items.name: init(numberOfVisibleItems: Int)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a newly allocated proportional layout, configured to display the given number of items.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a newly allocated proprotional layout object from a storyboard or nib file.

items.name: var numberOfVisibleItems: Int
items.desc: The number of items visible in the scrubber at once.
